desc: Tour of Honor is a premiere motorcycle ride that visits memorials across the USA. Patriotic tributes to military veterans and first responders that are recognized as American heroes, are included. Also recognized are War Dog and K9 heroes, American Doughboy statues, Huey and Apache Cobra helicopters, Gold Star Family.

layout.text: "Adding the Tour of Honor has been a total remaking to my ideals of what riding can be, and can mean." - Rider Jason McLaren
